boardgame.name: The Progenitors
boardgame.description:
publisher blurb

Learn all about the other magic users in the system, meet new enemies, learn new spells, master new weapons, and discover who was in this system before you in The Temple of the Ancients mission. 24 full pages of content!

boardgame.name: Tinker's Troubles
boardgame.description:
The first expansion to Apothecaria, Tinker's Troubles introduces a new locale known as The Workshop, an ancient mechanical fortress inhabited by mysterious machines and hobbyist artisans.

This small Patreon funded expansion includes:


16 new Ailments
14 new Reagents
A new Locale


And the new Projects mechanic which allows you to spend your Downtime making all sorts of hobbycrafts like furniture, mechanical doodads, and even magical items. Be careful though, the God of Crafts has been known to lurk around The Workshop and they are known to challenge those that cross their path.

boardgame.name: Devil in the Wilderness: Additional Witch Expansion
boardgame.description:
This 18-card Witch expansion pack makes it easier to play multiple witches in the core game. This pack will also give you the ability to add to your core deck, should you choose. By adding this pack to your core, you give yourself a chance to play the cards that work for you or the scenario you create in your game.

Most of the cards in this release are the same as the core Witch set; however, there are a couple of surprises.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Devil in the Wilderness: A Game of Witchcraft, Puritans, and New England Indians

boardgame.name: Devil in the Wilderness: Additional Witch Hunter Expansion
boardgame.description:
This 18-card Witch Hunter expansion pack makes it easier to play multiple witch hunters in the core game. This pack will also give you the ability to add to your core deck, should you choose. By adding this pack to your core, you give yourself a chance to play the cards that work for you or the scenario you create in your game.

Most of the cards in this release are the same as the core Witch Hunter set; however, there are a couple of surprises.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Devil in the Wilderness: A Game of Witchcraft, Puritans, and New England Indians

boardgame.name: Mary Anning
boardgame.description:
Follow in the footsteps of the 19th century English paleontologist and collect the best fossils as you excavate the dangerous cliffs of Lyme Regis.

A family friendly push your luck game inspired on the classic blackjack, with set a collection scoring mechanic and variable powers to spice up your games.

Players draw fossil cards from Lyme Regis' deck and add them to their excavation one by one. At the end of the round, the player who has come closest to 21 points, without going over, will be able to collect the fossil he wants from among all those played.

The game ends when one player fills all his boxes with fossils. It is time to evaluate the collections and determine which paleontologist deserves the victory.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Organizations: Board Games Association of Creators in Spain (LUDO)

boardgame.name: The Soul Sword Forge
boardgame.description:
(from the back cover)

Castle Rex has lain abandoned these last twenty years. Since the Creator disappeared and the great war ended without resolution, no one has been able to retain control over the castle. Stories of ancient magic, terrific treasures, and forge of creation itself have lured you into the castle depths. Will you make it out alive?

boardgame.name: Wickerpunk
boardgame.description:
Wickerpunk is where heroic fantasy and folk horror meet.
The rural, the pagan, the ancient, the sensual, the wyld. The true face of nature, red in tooth and claw. Wickerpunk is a book that details creating fantasy campaigns and adventures where the wyrd and wyld meet industry. Where nature and civilisation clash and dark hearts are laid bare.

This book advises fantasy DMs and GMs on how to reskin D20 character classes and concepts for a Wickerpunk campaign. It advises concepts such as historical settings, fantastic locations, and how to reimagine well-worn monsters as dark things of the forest and moor. And it gives players the tools
to confront the forces of darkness among the ancient runestones and shrines to forgotten saints and primal godlings of branch, bough and brook.
For any campaign that wishes to emphasize the true horror of
the natural world, and examine the colonial tensions of industry, especially in a fantastic setting, Wickerpunk is indispensable.

boardgame.name: Artemishea
boardgame.description: Artemishea is built on the principle of being a realistic open world animal survival game, where the player takes control of a creature

boardgame.name: The Battle of Baltim: The Missiles turn on Egypt
boardgame.description:
A ready to play scenario based on the battle of Baltim, a missile boat engagement in the Yom Kippur war between Israel and Egypt.

Designed for use with SHIPWRECK, Vandering Publications d10 based wargames rules system for naval warfare in the age of the guided missile. With a little modification could be used for other rules systems too.

Includes:

A description of the action, results and long-term consequences.
Ship detail sheets for all units involved.
Instructions to set up the scenario, starting positions, victory conditions, variation rules, and a solo play option.


—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: The Watcher in the Attic
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

DC-POA-PND-3 The Watcher in the Attic

(Part 2 of the Strange Case of Erland Forsk)

Strange lights have been appearing in the topmost windows of the Forsk estate, and local cats have been going missing. Will you find out what lurks in the attic?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

Using the DungeonCraft seed Awake and Afraid
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures
The Strange Case of Erland Forsk

boardgame.name: What Skitters Beneath?
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

DC-POA-PND-2 What Skitters Beneath?

(Part 1 of the Strange Case of Erland Forsk)

Strange things have been happening near the Wet Trout Tavern by the Easthaven docks. Mysterious lights, missing items, missing people, and now the bartender swears he saw a ghost! Can you help get to the bottom of this?

Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3

Using the DungeonCraft seed Burrowing Borrowers
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures
The Strange Case of Erland Forsk

boardgame.name: The Nightshade Sinners
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Four -Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

Stuck in a cave, and not a Frost Mandragora in sight.

The only way out is through, better start moving.

Part 2 of the Frost Mandragora Diptych.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Finding Harthin
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Four -Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

Harthin and Dohan has ventured into the cold north to find a medicine for Marcus, but the group they travelled with returned without them.

Part 1 of the Frost Mandragora Diptych.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: A Grim Tale at Winter Solstice
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Four -Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

The prequel of DC-PoA-CONMAR-04 Midwinter Celebration is here!

As Winter Solstice draws near, it is time for the traditional snipe hunt. Galadon the Great doesn’t have time for games, so he hires adventurers to take his place, but surprises await in Lonelywood.

This adventure can easily be adjusted to fit the themes of Midwinter, Winter Solstice, or Liar's Night.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Kobold Conspiracy 3: Who Let the Kobolds Out?
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Four-Hour Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

Adventurers have discovered something nefarious in the forest near Lonelywood, Concerned for the safety of her city Speaker Nimsy Huddle have called for experienced adventurers to come to their aid.
...
This is a Dungeoncraft Adventure that uses the "Out of the Woods" adventure seed and is Adventurers League legal as part of the Season 10- Plague of Ancients campaign, as well as fully playable in a homebrew game.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Wherever I May Float
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Four -Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

“See the world,” they said. “Go to Icewind Dale,” they said. Now you’re stuck in the icy wastes with wild animals and avalanches everywhere. At least taking measurements on the Reghed Glacier is a simple and peaceful assignment.

Included:


Guide to playing on a time limit.
Map for playing on a VTT.


This is a Dungeoncraft Adventure that uses the "This Seems Familiar" adventure seed and is Adventurers League legal as part of the Season 10- Plague of Ancients campaign, as well as fully playable in a homebrew game.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: The Frozen Snipe
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Join a Termalaine tradition - the Icewind Dale Snipe Hunt!

While Icewind Dale remains within the clutches of Auril's everlasting rime, Termalaine celebrates a tradition, the Icewind Dale Snipe Hunt. Perhaps this year's trek through the forest will yield the elusive snipe, which is reputed to bring great blessings, blessings that are sorely needed in the midst of Auril's wrath.

However, the woods are full of dangers and mysteries that will surely test the mettle of any hero!

The Frozen Snipe premiered at Coulee Con 2021. This adventure can be played by itself or as part one of the four-part Legends of the Icewind Dale Snipe series (which is sold as a bundle at a discount).

This is a 4-hour adventure for tier 1 characters, optimized for APL 1.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Driven Like the Snow
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Join a Termalaine tradition - the Icewind Dale Snipe Hunt!

While Icewind Dale remains within the clutches of Auril's everlasting rime, Termalaine celebrates a tradition, the Icewind Dale Snipe Hunt. Perhaps this year's trek through the forest will yield the elusive snipe, which is reputed to bring great blessings, blessings that are sorely needed in the midst of Auril's wrath.

However, the woods are full of dangers and mysteries that will surely test the mettle of any hero!

The Frozen Snipe premiered at Coulee Con 2021. This adventure can be played by itself or as part one of the four-part Legends of the Icewind Dale Snipe series (which is sold as a bundle at a discount).

This is a 4-hour adventure for tier 1 characters, optimized for APL 1.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Beasts of Burden
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Children playing a game of hide and seek leads to a hunt, delicate (or not) diplomacy, and a desperate fight!

When a child goes missing and orcs are spotted near the town, heroes are engaged to find the missing child. This simple quest quickly gets complicated when the heroes find they are in the middle of several groups with different agendas. Only hte heros can save the child and possibly much more!

Beasts of Burden premiered at Coulee Con 2021. This adventure can be played by itself or as part three of the four-part Legends of the Icewind Dale Snipe series (which is sold as a bundle at a discount).

This is a 4-hour adventure for tier 1 characters, optimized for APL 3.

This adventure, the other three parts of the series, and VTT maps are available as a bundle at a discount.

All royalties go to Extra Life.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: A Snipe in the Hand Is Worth Two Headaches
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Get rid of the darned snipe and save us from Barrow-Breath!

Termalaine suffers from the unintended side-effects of a great boon, including the threat of annihilation by Barrow-Breath and its minions. Great heroes must make difficult choices and face great perils if Termalaine will have any chance in this harsh land of eternal winter. Choices have consequences!

A Snipe in the Hand Is Worth Two Headaches premiered at Coulee Con 2021. This adventure can be played by itself or as part four of the four-part Legends of the Icewind Dale Snipe series (which is sold as a bundle at a discount).

This is a 4-hour adventure for tier 1 characters, optimized for APL 4.

This adventure, the other three parts of the series, and VTT maps are available as a bundle at a discount.

All royalties go to Extra Life.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: The Importance of Being Idol
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

A worried gnome needs your help to lift the curse that’s been plaguing him. Travel to the Tribelands north of Caer-Konig to bring him peace.

This is a Dungeoncraft Adventure that uses the "The Muttering Gnome" adventure seed and is Adventurers League legal as part of the Season 10 - Plague of Ancients campaign, as well as fully playable in a homebrew game.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Unrelenting
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

When a hare comes bearing the message of someone asking for aid, how could adventures resist the call for help. But perhaps there is something else stirring under the ice, something which could threaten all of Icewind Dale should it return.

This is a part of the Oar's Rest Adventure series.

Includes two detailed digital maps both with and without grids for use on VTT

This is a Dungeoncraft Adventure that uses the "Breaking Ice-olation" adventure seed and is Adventurers League legal as part of the Season 10 - Plague of Ancients campaign, as well as fully playable in a homebrew game.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Dark Age: Otherworld - The Immortal Winter
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

In Dark Age: Otherworld – The Immortal Winter you assume the role of a retainer for a Noble House. You will require the Dark Age: Legends Core Rulebook (CRB), the Dark Age: Otherworld Expansion, and two six-sided dice (2d6), along with a pen and paper or word-processing document, to play.

_____________________________________________________

In 1192 London is rapidly expanding. Nobles and their many courts from around the country of Albion call the City their home. Stately homes and small-scale palaces, in development for decades, are finally coming to fruition. For those who seek their fortune, the streets of London are seemingly paved with gold.

Amid this flourishing backdrop, a sinister plot is unfolding. As the Nobles become more fiercely territorial, those who serve them are taking the oppurtunity to earn Crowns through violence. Skirmishes are frequently fought in the name of protecting Noble interests. Trade, commerce, and many underhand dealings are regularly conducted under the watchful eye of rival Houses.

The many settlers who have arrived from the Otherworld through Merlin’s Portal are notable by their absence in Albion’s Capital. Those who are willing to discuss why this is tell tales of a great evil plaguing England’s Noble bloodlines.

boardgame.name: Mythic Magazine (Volume 9 - Aug 2021)
boardgame.description:
User summary:

Content:

What If: Matching An RPG To Your Style Of Solo Play
Tool Box: Generating NPC Behavior With Fate Questions
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: Generating NPC Behavior With Fate Questions
Matching An RPG To Your Style Of Solo Play

boardgame.name: Heaven, Here I Come!
天堂, 我要進來了!
boardgame.description:
Met the end of their lives, now all of the players are standing before the Gates of Heaven, hoping to win their way inside. A neatly-dressed old man appears before them and says, ”Heaven is nearly full! Unfortunately, there is not enough room for all of you. Discuss with each other and decide which of you shall not enter paradise.”

Heaven, Here I Come is an alignment game with deduction and bluffing. Players are secretly divided into two teams, the Sinner team and the Scapegoat team. Players will not usually know which team they are on at the beginning of the game. Each team may consist of one or more players. Try to determine which team you are on, keep it secret, and then figure out which team others are on. Eventually, someone will make an accusation and then the real fun begins.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Lying Pirates
boardgame.description:
Lying Pirates is a first to finish fast-paced dice game for 2-4 players (+2 with expansion)

You are the captain of your ship (cup) and the dice you have is your crew.

The game plays in a number of rounds where every round consists of three phases. Betting, sailing and action phase.

The betting phase: Inspired by the classic game Liars Dice , this poker-like mechanic will test your bluffing and probability skills.

The sailing: All except the loser sail forward on the map and battle for their event/tile. Some events you really want to explore and some you want to avoid at all cost.

The action phase: To aid you on your journey you'll have action cards on hand. Play these strategically to attack opponents and defend or upgrade your crew.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Speed Letters
boardgame.description:
Speed Letters, the game of words that are worth their weight in gold.
Start Speed Letters by giving each player an alphabet of 26 letter cards to stack face down in front of them.
Then show everyone the first word on a Treasure card, e.g. SCARLET, and hide it in the chest. "3, 2, 1, Go!
"Everyone goes through their alphabet and puts letters that are part of that word in the chest, saying them out loud! Act quickly, because the right letters will be rewarded with pearls, nuggets and rubies... but above all, listen carefully, to avoid placing too many letters that will cost you gems!
The game is played in 5 rounds, with increasingly longer words. Who will win the most treasures?

boardgame.name: Aventura Z: Vol 1 Lovecraft
boardgame.description:
Adventure Z is a narrative game for one or two players. In Volume 1: Lovecraft, players will take on the role of one or two investigators to solve a case cover in mystery and dark powers beyond the human understanding. Inspired in the H.P. Lovecraft literary work, this volume has two separate adventures ("Color Out of Space" and "The Shadow Over Innsmouth") with up to 40 different maps where the insight and cunning of the players will be essential to survive and discover up to five different endings per adventure.
You will only need the notebook, the deck of cards and a few dice, unfolding the game quickly to enter the adventure. After each scenario, the players will unlock new maps in which they will have to make decisions that will affect to the story, similar to what happens in "Choose your own adventure" books or a role-playing game.

Playing through the maps alone or as a pair will challenge players against dark enemies, ghoulish puzzles, clue investigation and puzzle solving.

Adventure Z's mechanics are easy to learn, each turn a player will have two actions that can be used to move their character, investigate an area on the map or activate a team card trying to free new maps before they run out of time.

A turn counter will limit the number of actions a player can do, sometimes having to choose between investigating everything or running to the next map. The adversaries have their own artificial intelligence, so you will not only have to control the survival of your characters.

Delve into the stories of Lovecraft and be the protagonist of your own story!
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Organizations: Board Games Association of Creators in Spain (LUDO)

boardgame.name: Med andra ord: Pocket
boardgame.description:
The word-explaining game Med andra ord made portable in this card based version. The words are on cards instead of tokens, and are worth 1-3 points depending on the difficulty.

You play in pairs, where one has to explain the word on the card "in other words" and the other guesses. In 45 seconds, you should try to explain and guess correctly on as many cards as possible. When the game is over, the points are added up according to the denomination on the cards. The team with the highest score wins.

boardgame.name: Cat in the Box: Deluxe Edition
盒中貓
boardgame.description:
Cat in the Box: Deluxe Edition is the quintessential quantum trick-taking card game for 2 - 5 cool cats, where your card’s color isn’t defined until you play it! Hypothesize how many tricks you will win, and record your bid. Place tokens on the community research board as you play your hand, and connect large groups of tokens to score even more points. Plan your tricks carefully as you cannot claim the color of a card with the same number that has already been declared. Doing so would be pawsitively catastrophic as you have just created a paradox!

New Deluxe Edition features:

Supports 2-5 players
High quality geekbits-style plastic tokens
Recessed player boards
Recessed Center Research board
Score pad
And a custom plastic insert to keep Cat in the Box: Deluxe Edition tidy!


—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Android: Netrunner – System Gateway
Entrada al sistema (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
System Gateway (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
Wejście do Systemu (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
システムゲートウェイ (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
核心网关 (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
系統入門 (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
시스템 게이트웨이 (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
boardgame.description:
System Gateway is NISEI’s foundational set. It is designed as an out-of-the-box learning experience and provides everything you need to start playing Netrunner. The cards in the set are straightforward, yet powerful, and will form the cornerstone of any player’s collection.

One copy of the System Gateway Starter Pack, plus the NISEI learn-to-play guide, is all two people need to learn Netrunner.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Magnum Opus (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)
System Update 2021 (fan expansion for Android: Netrunner)

boardgame.name: 1893: Cologne – Seahorse Tile Organizer
boardgame.description:
A set of 3D printed tile trays for the Marflow games 18xx title 1893.

This item comes with 3 Trays and a lid to hold all the track tiles (with a slot for each unique tile). The trays and lid are held together with magnets so that they don’t spill in transport but are easily separated when playing.

Please note that due to the handmade nature of the game some tiles will be a little tight in the trays. Usually this can be solved by trimming the points of the tiles to eliminate any extra “tip”

boardgame.name: 1882: Assiniboia – Seahorse Organizer
boardgame.description:
3D printed tile organizer for The newest printing by AAG of 1882 board game. 2 tile trays with magnets and steel embedded in them to keep them together in the box and a custom lid with steel in it as well to keep the top trays tiles in.

The token and share trays fit all the company shares in an easy to display style. The shares trays have 2 spots to fit all the games trains, and 2 spots for the privates and seating order cards. The round marker and priority deal beaver have a special spot as well. With the full set your entire game minus the charters is well organized and easily setup.

The card slots might look tight but they are designed so that the entire stack is easily removed (see last picture or video)

Shares and trains trays will not fit sleeved cards!


NOTE: a yellow city tile and a green tile are diecut with extra material protruding from the usual hex shape. You may have to trim these so that they fit in the trays properly****

boardgame.name: The Children of the World
Krakkar um víða veröld
Maailman lapset
boardgame.description:
A co-op educational game for 5-10-year-olds. The game teaches kids about the different cultures in the world.

The players win if they manage to get all 12 stamps to their passport. The players lose if the last ticket is turned over before they have collected all the stamps.

On each turn, the player rolls the die and moves their pawn towards the continent where one of the cards on the board belongs to. If the player reaches the continent, another player takes the card and tells them what to do if they're on the right continent. The card has a question or a task to do. If the player succeeds, they get a stamp. If the task fails or the continent was wrong, the card is returned on the board.

At the end of each turn, two discs are drawn blind from a bag. If both discs show an image of a conductor, the players must spend one of their seven tickets. The discs then go back to the box.

boardgame.name: Batman: Escape From Arkham Asylum
boardgame.description:
Batman: Escape from Arkham Asylum is a semi-cooperative dungeon crawl for 1 to 5 players in which the Super Villains of the Batman universe are the protagonists. This is one of the few games where you must defeat Batman, and that gives the player the opportunity to play as dozens of characters. The players will put themselves in the shoes of the most iconic Super Villains of Gotham City: The Joker, Harley Quinn, Two-Face, The Penguin, Bane, Poison Ivy and The Scarecrow. The goal? Escape from an iconic institution of Gotham City: Arkham Asylum.

Batman: Escape from Arkham Asylum offers the funny and wild vision of the comics of the Batman universe and introduces a novel element: confronting Batman. Players must join forces to achieve their common goal. However, each one of them will have their own hidden objectives, which can range from escaping on their own or sowing as much chaos as possible in the asylum, something they must achieve to gain an advantage over their companions and be the one who finally wins the victory.

The players choose a Super Villain and play their turns one after the other. In each of these turns, the players can perform different actions such as moving around on the board, attacking their enemies with crazy weapons, searching rooms or crafting tools to use in their escape. The game ends when the players escape or when everyone is defeated by the forces of order that run Arkham, from the tough guards of the complex to, of course, the Dark Knight himself.

boardgame.name: 1-Bit Mothership
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A "1-bit" low-fi conversion of MOTHERSHIP: Sci Fi Horror RPG by Tuesday Knight Games. To fully use 1-Bit Mothership you'll need a copy of the original game which is free (although you should buy it, along with the excellent modules).

Features:

Coin Flips (1 bit randomizers) rather than dice rolls!
A coin based skill system.
Streamlined and simplified rules.
Designed for maximum compatibility with Mothership modules.
Very simple conversion guide.

boardgame.name: The Swashbuckler Class for OSR Role Playing Games
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Swashbuckling character has a long literary history. A Swashbuckler is an acrobatic sword fighter that relies on speed, skill, and agility. While swashbucklers are portrayed in literature as having a cavalier devil may care attitude, they all have a code of chivalry and honor. Presented here is the swashbuckler class for the worlds oldest RPG.

boardgame.name: The Sword Master Advanced Job Guide
The Sword Master Guide
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Sword Master Advanced Job Guide is a new expansion for The Magical Land of Yeld, with everything you’ll need to become a master of swordplay! In this guide you’ll discover teh secrets of Yeld's traditional sword styles, meet new mentors eager to take you on as a student and challenge the ghost of Yelds greatest swordsman for the right to call yoursel a Sword Master! This Guide includes contains everything you'll need to become a Sword Master, including new Special dice, new Mentors, a Job Quest and new items for you to collect! This guide also includes advice for building and playing a Sword Master!

boardgame.name: The Magical Land of Yeld: Summer Collection 2021
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The 2021 Summer Collection is a selection of bonus content we've created for the Yeld RPG over the last year, including a brand new Advanced Job, a selection of new loot to collect and a parade of extra tough Boss Monsters designed to give Rank 1 and 2 players a run for their money!

boardgame.name: The Necromancer's Knife
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

An Undying Evil

In Belthaar, city of dark alleys, strange cults, and rival sorcerers, a threat rises from beyond the grave! Can you solve the mystery of the Necromancer's Knife before it is too late?

Savage Swords and Sinister Sorcery

"The Necromancer's Knife" is a stand-alone sword and sorcery adventure module, inspired by the pulp era tales of Robert E. Howard and Clark Ashton Smith. Venture in the footsteps of Conan the Cimmerian, Satampra Zeiros of Uzuldaroum, Imaro of Nyumbani, and other fabled thieves, reavers and slayers!

Written for the Fifth Edition (5E) of the world's most popular roleplaying game, the adventure in this book can be easily adapted to any fantasy roleplaying game ruleset or edition.

Note: This standalone adventure was originally published as part of the collection "The Spider-God's Bride and Other Tales of Sword and Sorcery". This new version has been updated to fifth edition rules and includes new maps and artwork.

Book features:

A fully detailed sword and sorcery adventure for character levels 1-2
Use as a stand-alone module for an evening or two of play, or use the background information as the basis for several adventures
A mix of mystery, roleplaying, skulduggery, dungeon exploration and deadly combat -- a chance for every character class to shine!
City and dungeon maps
New monsters and NPCs
New magic items

boardgame.name: Guild Generator
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

With this simple generator you will be able to create more or less serious guilds on the fly.

Every town has some guilds, such as the famous Fighters or Thieves Guilds. With this supplement you will be able to go beyond these clichés and generate guilds not neccessarely linked to character classes. This is bound to add a bit of chaos and give a more organic feeling to your world.

This supplement contains:

A table of content
Numerous tables to generate every aspects of a guild:
Field of expertise
Power (visibility, ressources, special asset, ...)
Particularties of their members (appearance and quirks)
A quick guild name generator to add a bit of variety

boardgame.name: Delver (Issue #1 - Aug 2021)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Delver Magazine is a bi-monthly (6 issues per year) resource for GMs of Old School RPG fantasy games such as Old-School Essentials, Basic Fantasy Role-Playing Game, and other OSR games. Each issue will include a ready-to-play adventure, printable props, random charts & tables, articles, and maps for the included adventure.

boardgame.name: 1849: The Game of Sicilian Railways – Seahorse Organizer
boardgame.description:
a 3D printed tile organizer for The newest printing by AAG of 1849 board game. 4 tile trays with magnets and steel embedded in them to keep them together in the box and a custom lid with steel in it as well to keep the top trays tiles in. All tiles types except the unique city tiles have their own location so you can see them all at once.

The token and share trays fit all the company shares in an easy to display style. The shares trays have 1 spot to fit the privates and seating order cards and 2 token locations for the terrain cost markers, round marker and. With the full set your entire game minus the charters, priority deal marker and train cards is well organized and easily setup.

The card slots might look tight but they are designed so that the entire stack is easily removed (see last picture or video)

Shares and trains trays will not fit sleeved cards.

boardgame.name: Lukuset
boardgame.description:
Celebrate Finnish literature in this trivia game. Four categories of questions on your way to the finish.

Similar to Trivial Pursuit, players roll a die and move around the board, answering questions based on the colour of the square you land. The first player to reach the final square and answer the question correctly is the winner.

boardgame.name: Medvěd WRR: Poprask na kolejích
The WRR: Railroad Mayhem
boardgame.description:
"Full steam ahead!" Engineer Crocs ordered his chums. They were busy with keeping the steel locomotive on the rails. The train was full of fairy-tale creatures who have become poor victims of Crocs' villainous plan. Can you save all the creatures before the train reaches its final station, as the WRR? Be quiet so Crocs doesn’t catch you!

Medvěd WRR: Poprask na kolejích (The WRR: Railroad Mayhem) is a fast paced dice game based on the popular Czech book for kids.

The objective of the game is to gain and combine colored cars by rolling dice in a way they make one of the winning combos. The player to do so first wins.

boardgame.name: Подводный Мир (Underwater World)
boardgame.description:
Help your favorite marine reserve take first place in the world ranking in the free, downloadable game.

Each player has their own deck of eight sea animals. Each of them has 3 characteristics: speed, immersion depth and food supply. In each round, players compete on one of these indicators.

During the game, players draw 3 cards from there asymmetrical decks and play one card. Cards from current and previous rounds are used do define the winner of a round in accidence with the scoring mechanic of a current round (three different variations). The winner of a round gains one point.

The game ends when one of a players gain 3 points.



У каждого игрока - собственная колода, состоящая из восьми морских животных. У каждого из них — 3 характеристики: скорость, глубина погружения и запас еды. В каждом раунде игроки соревнуются по одному из этих показателей.В свой ход противники одновременно кладут одно животное в закрытую. Затем так же одновременно — вскрывают карты. Победитель раунда определяется с учётом показателей двух карт: выложенной только что и сыгранной в прошлом раунде. Можно стараться победить в текущем раунде или спланировать свой ход так, чтобы иметь большие шансы на победу в следующем.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: La Danse Macabre
boardgame.description:
From the publishers blurb:

Dark things stir under our feet. Cretures born of vile necromancy or dark will. The undead rise from their grave in “La Danse Macabre” an unnoficial adventure module for “For Coin & Blood” and other OSR products.

In this tome you will find a new class “The Wretched” a skeleton with dangerous physical and magical properties as well as “The Crypt stained in red” an adventure for players of level 2-4 that pits a rich family and a graveyard full of angry residents.

boardgame.name: bird seed
Bird$eed
BirdSeed
boardgame.description:
BirdSeed is a card game from Japan. The game title is actually published as Bird$eed on the box front, and also as 'bird seed' in the game rules.

Players are roosters, trying to get food to score points. Getting sets of the same food scores best. Each rooster has a pair of favourite foods, and getting up to five of these adds points.

The food comes in three types, wheat, corn and nuts, in 1,2 or 3, or one of each. Cards showing a left wing, right wing and roosters are laid out, and three food cards dealt face-up to each one. Players then use card hands to win these food cards. Any food not collected stays in place and more food is added.

The players have hand cards to match the positions, and cards numbered 0,1,2,3 in different amounts. Players play three cards face-down, a place and two numbers to show which food pile they are going for and what number they bid. The numbers are added together and the game follows a butting process like Hols der Geier. But before the cards are assessed, any special combos take effect. So a pair, such as 11, gets you a free food card off the draw deck. A 00 gets you a food card from the player with the most.

Then players with a unique choice (left, right, centre) get their food. Then players with the same choice compare values. The highest value wins, but matching high values means the next highest wins, and so on.

At the end of the game, most points scored wins.
user summary
boardgame.boardgamedesigner: Fumiya Iwasaki (イワサキ フミヤ)

boardgame.name: Base
boardgame.description:
Base is a strategic, abstract puzzle game with a unique worker placement bid mechanism.

Grab modules and build your base! The goal of the game is to build as many rows and columns of 5 modules into your base following the given building instructions.

To get the necessary modules, you have to send trading delegations to neighbouring planets. As your fellow players will do the same, you should wisely choose the size of your delegation because size matters when it comes to trade negotiations. For each row or column that you accomplish within a round, you earn instant points that give you special actions. After 6 rounds, the game ends.

Now it’s time to score the secret side contracts that each of you signed with the private sector. The player with the most points wins the game and gets governor of his own planet.

boardgame.name: Moon Elves' Masquerade
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Famed hedonist Horatio Humbert, likewise possessed by an avarice for novelty, has offered a great bounty for any party-goers capable of convincing the moon elves to attend his next birthday. From his pleasure barge to the moon, this 4th level adventure mixes extended social and roleplay opportunities with a high-stakes, low-gravity boss fight your players will never forget!

Long ago, in the golden age of the elves, a collection of master mages and elven demigods decided to leave our world to create a utopia of undying revelry, bacchanalia, and hedonism. By the grace of the divines and the strength of their magic, they ascended to the moon. Yet the pleasure-seeking life, even free of time and death, is driven by desperate hungers, novelty chief among them. To combat their eternal ennui, the moon elves have taken to the lowest form of carousing: destination party tourism.

What's inside?

5 Adventure Phases
14 Social Encounters with 6 Tables of effects and narrative
1 High-stakes, low-gravity boss fight on a trip to the moon
2 high-resolution battle maps

boardgame.name: Triumphant! Super Heroic Role Playing Game: Revised and Expanded
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The superhero rpg space is a crowded market, so it takes some ingenious design to come up with something that works to genre, maintains simplicity in play but gives players enough room for narrative where they just want to enjoy the moment. Triumphant! did that - the author used his experience from developing the fabulous Supers! rpg (still available from Hazard Studios) to come up with something he believes is even better. Now, years later, Triumphant! has been revised and improved. It still has the same basic system but better explanations, more examples and some major tweaks where needed. The Sovereign City setting has been removed so what you have here is the basic rulebook to use in any setting you choose. However, Triumphant! works great with its own setting, so the first supplement will be the Soverweign City Setting Guide.

boardgame.name: Death's Curios
boardgame.description:
From the description:

You died. And you are not happy with it. Maybe you died in a violent way. Perhaps you still have unfinished business on Earth. Or possibly, you don’t want to say to your loved ones goodbye yet. The thing is, you are not alive anymore. But you can change that.

You’ve been given a second chance. Would you use it well and return to your previous life? Or maybe you will get lost in the Limbo, and become a Death’s Curios?

boardgame.name: Delta World Core Guidebook (5E)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

SURVIVE AND THRIVE IN A POST-APOCALYPTIC WORLD OF MUTANTS, ANDROIDS, CYBORGS, ROBOTS, AND HIGH TECHNOLOGY!

Delta World is a wild and sparsely populated future Earth. It is 150 years after The Great Catastrophe, an apocalyptic global war that resulted in the complete destruction of civilized society. The environmental contamination from chemical, biological and radiological warfare has resulted in a world of mutated beings: animals, humanoids, plants, and others.

Now, finally, the small communities of intelligent beings that have survived are beginning to claw their way back from the depths of technological ignorance. Their numbers are expanding, and they strive to create new civilizations once again. You are one of these intelligent beings. You live in a world that has been reclaimed by nature, where overgrown ruins can be exploited for the vast technology once mastered by the Ancient Ones. With luck, you and your companions can find these ancient ruins and scavenge the materials, equipment, and technology that you need to continue to advance. But the world is dangerous, unexplored, and treacherous. Can you survive?

Compatible with the Fifth Edition System Reference Document and Open Game License system rules for the world’s oldest roleplaying game, Delta World creates a post-apocalyptic, science fantasy expansion with a crisp gameplay experience and an old-school RPG feel.

The Delta World 5E Core Guidebook includes:

All player and game master supplemental rules in a single volume.
Complete rules for mutated and engineered character races, including mutated humanoids, mutated animals, mutated plants, androids, sentient robots, and cyborgs.
Expanded rules for mutations, cybernetic implants, and technological augmentations.
New skills, new equipment and gear, a new background, and a new class suitable for the post-apocalyptic science fantasy setting.
Enhanced rules and gaming aids for sandbox exploration.
Expanded rules for interacting with, repairing, and salvaging valuable materials from technological items.
New gaming aids for playing Delta World in a virtual tabletop environment, including rollable tables and high-quality pre-generated maps.
